name: Year of the Undead
description:
Year of the Undead is a collaborative story-telling game for 1-4 players that pits survivors against the slim odds of survival in a zombie apocalypse. Each player represents the actions of a different survivor in this grim and unforgiving new world that is ravaged by the hordes of undead.

But, there is still hope.

After one year has passed, the hordes of the undead will have decayed and the threat will be gone.

This game faces the players against a temporary apocalypse, and promises them a thriving future if they can endure one year of hardships against the zombies.

Do you have what it takes to survive?

Find out with the Year of the Undead.
